mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (reserveId ,guestId, roomId, reserveCheckIn, reserveCheckOut, reservePrice, reserveCap) VALUES (reserveSeq.NEXTVAL, #{guestId}, #{roomId}, #{reserveCheckIn}, #{reserveCheckOut}, #{reservePrice}, #{reserveCap})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reserve JOIN room ON reserve.roomId = room.roomId WHERE reserve.reserveId = #{reserveId}
SELECT reserveCheckIn, reserveCheckOut FROM reserve WHERE roomId= #{roomId} AND reserveStatus = '결제완료'
UPDATE reserve SET reserveConfirm=2, reserveStatus='결제취소', reservePayAmount=0, reserveRefund=#{reservePrice} WHERE reserveId=#{reserveId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reserve SET reserveConfirm=1, reserveStatus='결제완료', reservePayAmount=#{reservePrice}, reservePayDate=SYSDATE, reservePayType=#{reservePayType}, reserveApi=#{reserveApi} WHERE reserveId=#{reserveId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reserve JOIN guest ON reserve.guestId=guest.guestId JOIN room ON room.roomId = reserve.roomId JOIN host ON room.hostId = host.hostId WHERE reserve.guestId = #{guestId} ORDER BY reserve.reserveCheckIn ASC

SELECT H.hostId, H.hostName, H.hostPwd, H.hostImage, H.hostIntro, H.hostSuper, H.hostLang, H.hostRate, H.hostYear, H.hostJob, H.hostVerified, H.hostRegDate, H.hostDelDate, O.roomId, O.roomPrice, O.roomName, O.roomAddress, O.roomLoc, O.roomInfo, O.roomIntro, O.roomClean, O.roomPet, O.roomWPrice, O.roomCap, O.roomType, O.roomLat, O.roomLng, O.roomImage1, O.roomImage2, O.roomImage3, O.roomImage4, O.roomImage5, O.roomImage6, O.roomLikes, E.reserveId, E.guestId, E.reserveCheckIn, E.reserveCheckOut, E.reservePrice, E.reserveConfirm, E.reserveCal, E.reserveCap, E.reserveStatus, E.reservePayRate, E.reservePayAmount, E.reservePayDate, E.reservePayType, E.reserveDiscount, E.reservePoint, E.reserveBank, E.reserveAccHolder, E.reserveAccount, E.reserverApi, E.reserveRefund, G.guestName FROM host H INNER JOIN room O ON H.hostId = O.hostId INNER JOIN reserve E ON O.roomId = E.roomId INNER JOIN guest G ON E.guestId = G.guestId WHERE H.hostId=#{hostId} AND E.guestId=#{guestId}

SELECT H.hostId, H.hostName, H.hostPwd, H.hostImage, H.hostIntro, H.hostSuper, H.hostLang, H.hostRate, H.hostYear, H.hostJob, H.hostVerified, H.hostRegDate, H.hostDelDate, O.roomId, O.roomPrice, O.roomName, O.roomAddress, O.roomLoc, O.roomInfo, O.roomIntro, O.roomClean, O.roomPet, O.roomWPrice, O.roomCap, O.roomType, O.roomLat, O.roomLng, O.roomImage1, O.roomImage2, O.roomImage3, O.roomImage4, O.roomImage5, O.roomImage6, O.roomLikes, E.reserveId, E.guestId, E.reserveCheckIn, E.reserveCheckOut, E.reservePrice, E.reserveConfirm, E.reserveCal, E.reserveCap, E.reserveStatus, E.reservePayRate, E.reservePayAmount, E.reservePayDate, E.reservePayType, E.reserveDiscount, E.reservePoint, E.reserveBank, E.reserveAccHolder, E.reserveAccount, E.reserverApi, E.reserveRefund, G.guestName FROM host H INNER JOIN room O ON H.hostId = O.hostId INNER JOIN reserve E ON O.roomId = E.roomId INNER JOIN guest G ON E.guestId = G.guestId WHERE E.reserveId=#{reserveId}
